tool_description: Reconciles transaction records with settlement data to identify discrepancies, pending settlements, and reconciliation status.

transaction_data_id.description: Reference ID of previously extracted transaction data

tolerance_amount.description: Acceptable variance amount for reconciliation matching

include_pending.description: Whether to include pending settlements in analysis

error_messages: Invalid transaction data ID: Provided ID does not reference valid transaction data.
Invalid settlement data source: Settlement data source not found or inaccessible.
Invalid tolerance amount: Must be a non-negative number.
Data mismatch: Settlement data time range does not overlap with transaction data.
Missing settlement data: No settlement records found for the specified period.
usage: Provide transaction_data_id and settlement_data_source, configure tolerance levels and pending settlement handling for accurate reconciliation.

unreconciled_transactions.description: Number of transactions without matching settlements

discrepancy_amount.description: Total monetary value of discrepancies found
